summary: This is a memorandum from the Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General (OIG) documenting a voluntary interview conducted on September 22, 2021, with a Federal Bureau of Prisons (BOP) Unit Manager at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York. The interview was part of the OIG's investigation into the death of inmate Jeffrey Epstein, who was housed at MCC New York in July and August 2019. The memorandum references attached documents including the interview transcript, a signed warnings form, an earlier FBI 302 interview of the Unit Manager, and a memorandum written by the Unit Manager regarding Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the OIG investigation; a federal inmate who died while housed at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York in July and August 2019.

persons.name: Special Agent
persons.context: Conducted the voluntary interview of the BOP Unit Manager on September 22, 2021, as part of the OIG investigation into Epstein's death.

persons.name: Senior Special Agent
persons.context: Conducted the voluntary interview of the BOP Unit Manager on September 22, 2021, alongside the Special Agent.

persons.name: Assistant Special Agent in Charge
persons.context: Reviewed the prepared OIG memorandum documenting the interview.

connections.description: Both are OIG agents who jointly conducted the interview of the BOP Unit Manager.
The Special Agent is investigating the circumstances surrounding Epstein's death as part of the OIG inquiry.

events.title: OIG Interview of BOP Unit Manager
events.description: The Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General conducted a voluntary, recorded interview with a BOP Unit Manager from MCC New York regarding the death of Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: FBI 302 Interview of BOP Unit Manager
events.description: The FBI previously interviewed the same BOP Unit Manager, as referenced by an attached FBI 302 form.

events.title: Unit Manager's Memorandum on Epstein

events.title: Epstein's Incarceration at MCC New York
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was housed at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York during July and August 2019, prior to his death.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, New York
keyFacts: The Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General (OIG) was actively investigating the death of Jeffrey Epstein as of September 2021.
A key witness was a BOP Unit Manager at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York who was present when Epstein was housed there in July and August 2019.
The OIG interview on September 22, 2021, was recorded and transcribed, and the memorandum references several attached documents including an earlier FBI 302 interview from August 12, 2019.
The document explicitly states it contains neither recommendations nor conclusions, indicating it is a factual record of an investigative step.
The BOP Unit Manager's name is redacted in the provided text, indicating the individual is a protected witness or source within the investigation.
